duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitate annual planning and OKR operational activities with a focus on driving consensus and providing direction to cross-functional stakeholders.
Maintain schedule of activities, provide regular status updates, and work with a range of people across the company from executives to individual contributors.
Build end-to-end project plans, facilitate planning workshops, and host weekly status/check-in discussions to cover status, risks, and decisions needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Project Management, Business, or a related field
